A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 1. Luke Skywalker's character ark is B.S. Luke overcame his Darth Vader\, and indirectly\, the Emperor ; he should have remained optimistic and confident even as an older Jedi; obewan was more optometistic after seeing all he held dear fall apart.
